info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:21PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern San Juan and eastern Kane Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 521 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antelope Island, or 9 miles north of Page, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Water, Stateline Wash Slot Canyon, Labyrinth Canyon, Stud Horse Point, Antelope Island, Lake Powell and Dangling Rope Marina. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 0 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
